title: 1971년 Harrington 사건

description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Louis Harrington
**판결일**: 1971-06-09
**법원**: New York Court of Appeals
**관할**: New York, NY

**판사**: Burke

## 변호인

Reginald F. Lewis for appellant., Carl A. Vergari, District Attorney (James J. Duggan of counsel), for respondent.

## 인용

- 29 N.Y.2d 498

## 판결문 요약


Judgment affirmed.
Concur: Judges Scileppi, Bergan, Jasen and Gibson. Judge Burke dissents and votes to modify in the following opinion in which Chief Judge Fuld and Judge Breitel concur.
...
